== Description ==
Load the [[wikipedia:Resource_Description_Framework|RDF]] [[wikipedia:Rss|RSS]] 0.91 Feed template. 

== Usage ==

== Parameters ==
None.

== Return Values ==
; (void) : This function does not return a value.
